message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"those (refers to several people or things far from the speaker)","sentence":"那些学生在学校。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation showing a group of students standing together in front of a school building, with subtle, muted colors and a gentle, surreal atmosphere, emphasizing the idea of 'those students'.","sentence_translation":"Those students are at the school."}
